Group.Description: Group assignment based on participants' responses to observing touch videos

Vicarious_touches.Description: Number of video trials in which the participant reported feeling a tactile sensation

Hand_touches.Description: Number of video trials in which the tactile sensation was localised to one or both hands

Both_hands.Description: Number of video trials in which the tactile sensation was felt on both hands

Left_hand.Description: Number of video trials in which the tactile sensation was felt on the left hand

Right_hand.Description: Number of video trials in which the tactile sensation was felt on the right hand

Finger.Description: Number of video trials in which the tactile sensation was felt on the finger

V*_Feel_touch.Description: Whether the participant experienced a tactile sensation while watching the video

Levels.No: Participant did not feel a tactile sensation

V*_Sensation.Description: The type(s) of sensation experienced by the participant

V*_Sensation_text.Description: Free-text description of the sensation experienced

V*_Intensity.Units: Rating on a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely)

V*_Category.Description: How the sensation felt to the participant

V*_How_pleasant.Units: Rating on a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely)

V*_How_unpleasant.Units: Rating on a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely)

V*_How_painful.Units: Rating on a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely)

V*_Where.Description: Location on the participant's body where the tactile sensation was felt

V*_Where_text1.Description: First free-text description of where the participant felt the tactile sensation

V*_Where_text2.Description: Second free-text description of where the participant felt the tactile sensation

V*_Where_text3.Description: Third free-text description of where the participant felt the tactile sensation
